meanings.definition: The first or front finger on the hand, next to the thumb.
meanings.sent1: She pointed at the map with her forefingers.
meanings.sent2: He used his forefingers to pick up the small coin.
meanings.sent3: The magician made the coin disappear with a wave of his forefingers.
meanings.sent4: Her forefingers danced across the piano keys, creating a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent5: The child traced shapes in the sand with his forefingers, giggling with delight.

meanings.definition: The finger next to the thumb on the hand.
meanings.sent1: The toddler sucked on his forefingers for comfort.
meanings.sent2: She held the delicate flower between her forefingers.
meanings.sent3: The chef expertly chopped the vegetables with his sharp forefingers.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted intricate details using only her forefingers.
meanings.sent5: The kitten playfully batted at the toy with its tiny forefingers.
